definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sprout, spring up (NH id., so Targum [[חְמַח]]; Sir. s.mah. spring or shine forth, s.emh.o0 shining, also sprout; Ph. [[חמח]] posterity);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[חָֽמַח־בּוֹ]] Le 13:37; 3 pl. [[וְחָֽמְחוּ]] consec. Is 44:4; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְמַח]] Job 5:6, 3 fpl. [[תִּחְמַחְנָה]] Is 42:9, etc.; Pt. [[חׂמֵחַ]] Ex 10:5, [[חוֹמֵחַ]] Ec 2:6; fpl. [[חׂמְחוֹת]] Ge 41:6, Ge 41:23; —sprout, spring up:

of plants, trees, etc. Ge 2:5, Ex 10:5 (both J), Ge 41:6, Ge 41:23 (E), Ez Eze 17:6 (in fig.); once (late) [[יַעַר]] [[חוֹמֵחַ עֵחִים]] Ec 2:6 wood sprouting with trees (full of growing trees); fig. of future ruler (v. [[חֶמַח]] ) Zec 6:12, posterity Is 44:4, cf. Job 8:19, trouble([[עָמָל]]) Is 5:6, truth ([[אֱמֶת]]) Ps 85:12, restoration ([[אֲרֻכָֽתְְ]]) Is 58:8, future events Is 42:9.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: grow abunduntly, always of hair;—Pf. 3 ms. [[חִמֵּחַ]] Ez Eze 16:7 (in fig.): Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחַמַּח]] 2Sa 10:5 = 1Ch 19:5 (of beard); Inf. cstr. [[לְחַמֵּחַ]] Ju Jdg 16:22 (Samson's hair).

cause to grow, c. acc. of plant, subj. ´[[י]] Ge 2:9, Ps 104:14, cf. Job 38:27, c. 2 acc. Ps 147:8 who causeth mts. to sprout grass; fig., obj. [[חֶמַח חְדָקָה]] Je 33:15; horn ([[קֶרֶן]]) of Isr. Ez Eze 29:21, of David Ps 132:17; righteousness, etc. Is 61:llb; cf. also 2Sa 23:5 (if interrog., v. Dr Bu ; otherwise HPS); subj. ground Ge 3:18 cf. Is 61:11 (sim.), De 29:22 (obj. om.); also (fig.) Is 45:8 (cf. Di Kit).
of rain, cause the earth to sprout (abs.), Is 55:10.
